job_title: Lead II - Enterprise Solutions - .NET/Node Full Stack Technical Lead
jd: .NET/Node Full Stack Technical Lead with Experience in App Migration from AWS to Azure• Position Title: .NET/Node Full Stack Technical Lead• Experience Level: 7+ years of relevant experienceTechnical Skills:• Strong proficiency in .NET (C#) and Node.js development.• Experience with front-end frameworks such as Angular, React, or Vue.js.• In-depth knowledge of cloud platforms, particularly Azure.• Proven experience in migrating applications from AWS to Azure.• Familiarity with microservices architecture, RESTful APIs, and serverless computing.• Experience with Azure services like Azure App Service, Azure Functions, Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS), and Azure DevOps.• Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and tools like Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or Azure DevOps Pipelines.• Strong understanding of database technologies, including SQL Server, MongoDB.Preferred Qualifications:• Certification in Azure (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert) is a plus.• Experience with Docker and container orchestration platforms like Kubernetes.• Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
